item.title: Beo4 Enabled Commander Remote Control: Seamless Integration of Beogram 4002 or 4004 with More Recent B&O Systems
item.description: Dirk, a Beolover from Berlin, recently reached out about controlling his Beogram 4004 turntable with a Beo4 remote. He wanted to seamlessly integrate the turntable with his existing Beosound 9000 system. I found his idea intriguing and decided to modify the Beolover Commander remote to make it compatible. This involved adding a 455kHz IR receiver for Beo4 communication and deciphering the Beo4’s code system to rewrite the Commander’s firmware accordingly.
